name: Universe
description: Universe is a no-code website builder that enables users to create custom websites, online stores, portfolios, and more using a drag-and-drop interface with AI assistance.
longDescription: Universe is a visual, no-code platform designed for building websites without any programming skills, making web design accessible to everyone. Its mission is to make website creation fun, fast, and easy, allowing users to work from any device like phones, tablets, or computers. The platform helps users solve the challenges of technical web development by offering intuitive tools, templates, and AI to generate site elements quickly. It caters to diverse needs, such as creating online stores, portfolios, event pages, blogs, or fan sites, with integrated features for commerce and growth. Universe empowers non-technical individuals and businesses to launch professional sites efficiently, fostering creativity and online presence.
features: Drag-and-drop editor enables visual website construction without needing HTML or CSS, making it user-friendly for beginners.
AI generation of website elements allows users to create components quickly and customize them to fit their vision.
Hundreds of professionally designed templates provide ready-made starting points for various site types, accelerating the building process.
Built-in commerce tools support selling physical goods and digital downloads, including discounted shipping labels for efficient e-commerce.
Integrated analytics track website traffic and performance, helping users make informed decisions to improve their sites.
Mailing list tools facilitate collecting and managing subscriber emails to build and engage audiences effectively.
SEO tools optimize sites for search engines, enhancing visibility and driving organic traffic.
Social media integrations allow seamless connection and promotion across platforms to expand reach.
Unlimited blocks in all plans offer flexibility for designing complex pages without content restrictions.
4K image uploads in higher plans ensure high-quality visuals, ideal for professional portfolios and stores.
Real-time visual editing lets users preview changes instantly, streamlining the design workflow.
Mobile accessibility supports building and editing websites on phones or tablets for on-the-go convenience.
Versatile site type support caters to creating portfolios, blogs, event pages, and fan sites with tailored features.

faqs.question: What is Universe?
faqs.answer: Universe is a no-code website builder that allows users to create custom websites using a drag-and-drop interface accessible on any device.

faqs.question: Is Universe free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Universe offers a free plan with core features like unlimited blocks, mailing lists, and SEO tools, while premium plans provide advanced capabilities.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use Universe?
faqs.answer: No, Universe is built for non-technical users, requiring no coding knowledge and relying on visual tools and AI assistance.

faqs.question: Can I build an online store with Universe?
faqs.answer: Yes, starting from the Base plan, users can add commerce features to sell physical and digital products with integrated tools.

faqs.question: What devices are compatible with Universe?
faqs.answer: Universe works on any device, including smartphones, tablets, and computers, for flexible website building.

faqs.question: How does the AI feature in Universe work?
faqs.answer: The AI generates website elements in minutes based on user inputs, which can then be edited and incorporated into the site design.

faqs.question: Are templates available on Universe?
faqs.answer: Yes, Universe provides hundreds of professionally designed templates to kickstart website creation for various purposes.

faqs.question: What analytics tools does Universe offer?
faqs.answer: Universe includes built-in analytics to monitor traffic, visitor behavior, and site performance for optimization.

faqs.question: Does Universe support SEO?
faqs.answer: Yes, it features built-in SEO tools to help improve search engine rankings and increase site visibility.

faqs.question: What kind of support is available on Universe?
faqs.answer: Higher-tier plans like Complete offer premium support, while all users can access resources and community help.
